name: HSP_ACCT_CMNT_HAR
description: This table contains the Claim Remark field from the Hospital Account Receivable (HAR) master file.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: This column stores the line number in the results of a query. Because multiple value codes can be stored in one hospital account, each code will have a unique line number.

columns.name: REMARK_CMS1500
columns.description: Claim Remark: User-entered notes associated with claims attached to a hospital account.
